# Angular acceptance of a PMT inside the mDOM normed to theta = 0 
# Simulated with Geant4 by L.Classen, modified by T.Kittler
# Ice was used as surrounding medium
# Set to 0 for theta >= 90deg in order to be consistent with the flat disk approach in clsim
# Each value was devided by cos(theta) in order to correct for the geometrical factor included by the flat disk
# Jul 2016
# cos(theta)    normed acceptance
